H0.text: Nitrogen is used in respiration to generate energy, which is the main reason humans need nitrogen to survive.

H1.text: Nitrogen is used in making the proteins in the body, which is the main reason humans need nitrogen to survive.

H2.text: Nitrogen is used to help the body eliminate wastes, which is the main reason humans need nitrogen to survive.

H3.text: Nitrogen is used by nerve cells to conduct impulses, which is the main reason humans need nitrogen to survive.

A4.text: The total nitrogen content of organic matter is mainly formed by the amino groups in proteins.

A5.text: In animals, proteins are needed in the diet to provide the essential amino acids that cannot be synthesized.
